name: Organic extra virgin olive oil (1 l)
description: high-quality oil; excellent for daily cooking or finishing; retained nutrients & flavor.

name: Natural Honey
description: Pure natural honey, seasonal; flavor depends on local flowers; maybe thyme or herbal notes; unpasteurized; thick texture.

name: Homemade Black Olive Tapenade
description: Black olives, capers, olive oil, garlic, maybe citrus; smooth or slightly chunked; ideal for spreading on toast, mixing into pasta.

name: Homemade Jam
description: Small batch, local fruit (fig, apricot, strawberry etc.); no artificial preservatives; fresh flavor; good as topping or gift.

name: Citrus-Scented Soap Bar
description: Handmade with olive oil base, essential oils (lavender, lemon, etc..), gentle exfoliant; rustic design.

name: Almond Butter
description: Locally made; ground almonds + a bit of honey or salt; creamy; good spread.
